title: Autonomous Vehicle Rumors Swirl in Charlotte
summary: Sightings in Uptown Charlotte fuel speculation about Waymo's potential expansion to the city, enabled by a 2017 state law.
charlotte_impact: Autonomous vehicles could revolutionize transportation, impacting jobs and infrastructure in the Charlotte area.

title: Stolen U-Haul Recovery Leads to Two Arrests
summary: Huntersville police recovered a stolen U-Haul and arrested two suspects using license plate reader technology.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the effectiveness of technology in law enforcement and crime prevention in Huntersville.

title: Bank of America Stadium Renovation Preview Center Opens
summary: An interactive experience center in Uptown Charlotte offers a first look at the upcoming Bank of America Stadium renovation.
charlotte_impact: Provides community members and fans an early glimpse into the future of a major Charlotte venue.

title: Charlotte's Electric Fire Engine Out of Service
summary: Charlotte's first fully-electric fire engine is temporarily out of service, with a traditional engine replacing it to maintain emergency response.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates the challenges of adopting new technologies in critical public services.

title: Charlotte Weather: Warming Trend After Cold Tuesday
summary: Charlotte experiences a cold Tuesday, followed by a warming trend with temperatures reaching the 60s by Wednesday and possible rain later in the week.
charlotte_impact: Provides a brief weather forecast, impacting daily planning for residents.

title: Teens Charged in Deadly Rock Hill Shooting
summary: Two teens are charged in a Rock Hill shooting where a robbery attempt resulted in the death of the robbery suspect.
charlotte_impact: Addresses serious crime involving youth and gun violence in a neighboring community.

title: Charlotte Residents Question High Natural Gas Bills
summary: Charlotte residents express concern over significantly higher Piedmont Natural Gas bills.
charlotte_impact: Addresses economic concerns and potential issues with utility pricing for Charlotte residents.

title: Stanly County Deputy Involved in Deadly Shooting
summary: The NC SBI is investigating a deadly shooting involving a Stanly County deputy; details are limited.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a critical incident involving law enforcement, prompting investigation and public interest.

title: Evolution of the State of the Union Address
summary: An overview of how the State of the Union address has transformed from a constitutional report to a major national event.
charlotte_impact: Provides historical context to a significant political event.

title: Northeast Storm Causes Travel Chaos at Charlotte Airport
summary: A nor'easter impacting the Northeast leads to numerous flight cancellations and crowded terminals at Charlotte Douglas Airport.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the impact of weather events on travel and transportation in Charlotte.

title: Rev. Jesse Jackson Sr. to Lie in State at SC State House
summary: Rev. Jesse Jackson Sr. will lie in state at the South Carolina Statehouse on March 2, honoring his legacy.
charlotte_impact: Recognizes the contributions of a prominent civil rights leader with ties to the region.

title: Charlotte Invests $4M in Affordable Housing
summary: Charlotte City Council approves a $4 million investment in affordable housing in the Five Points neighborhood, expected to create 145 units.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the critical need for affordable housing in Charlotte.

title: Two Charged in Monroe Shooting
summary: Two individuals are charged in connection with a December shooting at an occupied house in Monroe, where 10 bullets struck the residence.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a violent crime affecting community safety in Monroe.

title: Measles Case Confirmed in Burke County
summary: A measles case is confirmed in Burke County, with possible exposure locations released to the public.
charlotte_impact: Alerts the public to a contagious disease outbreak and potential health risks.

title: Man Attacks Ex-Girlfriend's Co-worker at Carolina Mall
summary: A man attacked his ex-girlfriend's co-worker with a baseball bat at Carolina Mall on Saturday morning.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a violent assault in a public place.
